wikipedia_page.main: Felicity Landon is an English freelance journalist specialising in global maritime, industry and logistics. She is based near Stowmarket, in Suffolk. Landon works as a feature writer, reporter, columnist and editor. She has worked in the maritime sector for more than 25 years.

response: Contributors to the Magazine include Felicity Landon, Peter de Langen, Martin Rushmere, Barry Cross, Ben Hackett and Barry Parker. Port Strategy also has correspondents in 5 countries.
